reviewText: For what it is, it is very good. This is a reorder as the copy I had originally purchased got lost in a move among some other titles. Marie Forsa has been in a number of films, some more explicit than others, but in her case shot in a conservative way as she did not want be portrayed as a Porn Actress. Another good one with her is Flossie ( Mac Aumberg ). Justine and Juliet was good, but her role was somewhat subdued. This one is probably the best of the lot that I've seen with her, closely followed by Flossie and Bel Ami. Those three are probably her most explicit films.

reviewText: I found this movie years ago on VHS (hc edition)& fell in love with Marie.  I was disappointed in that copy as it cut off about 15 mins before the end.  I then found the DVD (sc edition) & discovered the rest.  DVD was a much better (technically) & complete than the VHS.  Then along came this edition with both versions of the movie.  She plays a beautiful, young & vivacious woman.  Naive about the world, but not her body.  Marie gives her all as a small town farm girl who goes off to the big city to be a model (leaving behind boyfriend Eric Edwards).  Instead, she finds a lingerie salesman who has her try on his wares in the forest.  Next up, she meets Harry (rich night club owner) & moves in with him in his groovy pad & girlfriend.  Marie quickly ousts the other.  Harry has sex with Marie & 3 or 4 other women throughout the movie until she grows tired of his exploits & storms out with just her suitcase & the clothes she came in with.I am pleased to say that Joe Sarno became one of my favorite directors after this..I am only lacking "Flossie" to finish up Marie's dvd collection.Enjoy.
